title: ranked
body: Why do we only can go duo in ranked put it back that we can play like 3 or 5 cuse thats bullshit when we are 3 we cant play with friends cuse only duo...

replies.body:
>The Hungarian Boards is for those who speak Hungarian.
We can totally accept that you would like to express yourself in English or some other language, but most people here only understand Hungarian. Please use the appropriate sub-forum as posting here in a foreign language could get your post deleted.


Please if you have a problem, use the [English boards](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/hu).

---
"Nem in, hanem out"
[[GYIK és Szabályzat]](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/hu/c/altalanos-beszelgetes/0krXUB6R-a-farumok-szabaalyzata-aos-gyik) [[Fórumos Addonok]](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/hu/c/minden-egyeb/AehaAUjI-nemin-addonjainak-listaaja) [[Fórumos Discord Szerver]](https://discord.gg/M28bRuX)
